doc.previous: It is the executive organ of the Organisation entrusted with the implementation of the decisions of the two preceding bodies and is located in Jeddah Saudi Arabia The current secretary general of this international organisation is Iyad Bin Amin Madani from Mecca Saudi Arabia since 31 January 2014
